Instruction: push the button with the same color as the light.
(example_som)
<Start Analyzing>
The desktop has three buttons, a yellow light and some numbers associated with it.
- Blue button label as 6.
- Gray button label as 7.
- White button label as 8.
- White light label as 9.
In this task, I need to push the button with the same color as the light.
The white button is labeled as label 8, and the white light labeled as 9.
All other objects, including blue button, blue button, parts of the robotic arm, and the background, are distractions.
<End Analyzing>
objects = {
    "white_button": 8,
    "white_light": 9
}
